name: dubtrack.fm - Better lobby (fancy)
description: A more dressed-up version of the better lobby style made for people who think plain and utilitarian are mutually-exclusive.
additional_info: This is created with the default colour scheme in mind. You will need to analyze whatever theme you are using to find what colours you need for integration with other themes. This style makes extensive use of linear gradients with acute angles to create a more edgier-looking appearance, as well to improve the profile of the lower-left corner where a room creator's avatar is. A pseudochild in each community listing's video preview caps off the angled appearance, added mostly for kicks, but also to compliment the angle seen in the user count. 10/27/15 Removed font family declaration. Want it back? Install this style.
